title: Gothic Reflection
prompt: A captivating high-contrast photograph captures a surreal and gothic tableau. In the dimly lit room, a skeleton is seated at an ornate and intricate dressing table. It is adorned in a luxurious black and red suit, though it is barefoot and without hair. A rusted gold crown sits askew on its bare skull. One bony hand is raised, gently touching its face as it gazes into a tall, antique mirror with a gilded, intricate frame. Much of its bone structure is starkly visible from its back and down its legs. The mirror, however, does not reflect the skeleton. Instead, it reveals a young man, his face a perfect match to the provided image, with dark messy hair, muted pink lips, fair skin, and delicate features. He wears a similarly opulent high-collar black and red suit, and a golden crown, like the skeleton's, rests on his head. A hand, covered in a full-laced glove, mirrors the skeleton's gesture, touching his own face. The room is shrouded in shadows, the soft, flickering light of candles casting a mysterious glow on the heavy red drapes that frame the scene. Scattered red roses litter the surface of the dressing table, their petals like drops of blood in the gloom. In the background of the mirrors reflection, a dark, arched windoW with stained glass offers a hint of a moonlit night beyond. The overall atmosphere is one of dramatic contrast- between life and death, beauty and decay-steeped in a mood of dark romance. The lighting is profoundly dark and soft, enhancing the scene's dramatic and ethereal quality.
